Authors and Citation

  • Jan Salecker. Author.

  • Marco Sciaini. Author.

  • Marina Papadopoulou. Reviewer.
    Marina reviewed the package for ropensci, see <https://github.com/ropensci/software-review/issues/262>

  • Sebastian Hanss. Maintainer.
    Package maintainer together with Jan Salecker
